4. Past artistic directors have included Fritz Lehmann, from 1934 to 1953, except for a break from 1944 through 1946 related to conflict with the Nazi authorities. In September 2011, Tobias Wolff assumed the post of "Intendant" (Managing Director) of the Festival, and Laurence Cummings became the new artistic director of the festival.
